name: Gridlock
description:
Gridlock puts you in command of the most hectic parking lot in the world. You'll have to react fast to arriving cars and think on your feet to make sure that as many parking spaces are taken as possible.

How to Play

You get paid for every car you handle, so you should pack the lot with as many cars as possible, while keeping wasted space to a minimum. Cars come in different sizes and may prevent one another from reaching the place you allocated, so be careful not to get gridlocked.

The game ends when there's no more space, or when the line outside the parking lot gets too long.

Credits

  • Art: Kirill Vnukov, Anton Mariushkin
  • Level Design, UI: Kyrylo Cherkashyn (Lobstercorner)
  • Programming, music: Taras Denysenko (terrapass)
